Articles.Content:
I know that it is a hard work to stay on this project but..

the load/save system could be better if you devs can add some filters like date/time sorting in the load/save GUI..

Imagine that i always have to open the save folder to remember which is the latest saved game..

It could be good to have an auto-saving system too, where we can set periodically autosaving files!

 

By the way, good job and keep working!
